participant_1.background:
I need some time to myself.
my father recently had a heart attack.
I keep my mind active by learning new things and trying new challenges.
i make 30k a year.
i enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.

participant_2.background:
I am so happy to be close to my parents and my daughters are really excited about our new home.
I'm afraid of being judged for my ethnicity.
i like to draw and paint in my spare time.
i love owning nice office supplies.
I am not sure if I am a healthy person, but I know that I am trying my best.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Hello! It's going well, thanks for asking. How are you doing today?
I'm doing okay, thanks for asking. I'm just relaxing after a long day of work. What about you?
I'm just about to head to work, actually. I'm an artist, and I'm working on a new project.
That sounds really fun! I'm not very artistic, but I enjoy looking at art. What kind of art do you create?
I mostly do drawing and painting, but I'm also interested in sculpture. I like to use a variety of mediums, depending on what I'm trying to achieve.
That's really cool! I'm sure your work is beautiful.
Thanks, I appreciate that! I'm always working to improve my skills.
I'm sure you're doing a great job! What kind of projects do you work on?
I've done a lot of different projects, but I'm currently working on a series of portraits of my daughters.
That sounds like a really special project. I'm sure they'll love them.
Thanks, I hope so! I'm trying to capture their personalities and their unique beauty.
I'm sure you'll do a great job. I'm excited to see them when they're finished.
Thanks! I'll be sure to post them on social media when they're done.
